description.value:
Relic Rune Stones of the Space Wolves. When used by a Rune Priest prior to embarking on a Mission, can provide one of three bonuses: 1. Choose one mission objective, add 3d10 Kill markers to its completion. 2. Choose one member of the Kill Team (including the Character), once during the mission they can recover all spent Fate Points. 3. Once during the mission, the kill team can restore 1d10+3 Cohesion Points.

Requirements

Space Wolves Rune Priests (Librarians) only.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 25 R
